segments.text: My Chinese friends told me that the Spring Festival is coming soon . Can you tell me something about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . It â€™ s actually the Chinese New Year and is regarded by the Chinese as the most important holiday of the year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Family members usually get together on the Eve of the New Year and have a special dinner to celebrate . Relatives and friends often visit each other during the holiday to wish each other a happy new year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do people cook a lot of special dishes for the holiday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , just like Christmas in western countries , it is a time for eating lots of special food .
segments.speaker: S2
